resources.string: GeoQuiz

Europe was named after a princess from Roman mythology
The USA has five time zones
There are 30 countries located in the Southern Hemisphere
The Mariana\'s Trench is the deepest point in the ocean
Hokkaido is the northernmost prefecture in Japan
